div.label: Translate Page

a.title: Search
a.style: color: white; font-family: Verdana; text-decoration: none;

div.class: hide-for-small medium-3 large-3 columns three navlinks

span.p:
The Bethel-Tate Local School Board of Education will meet on the 28th day of April,
2020 at 6:00 p.m. for a regular meeting.

Consistent with House Bill 197, the meeting will be streamed live to the public, but the
building and meeting will be physically closed to the public due to COVID-19 health
concerns. The live stream video of the meeting can be viewed from
https://zoom.us/j/96832884219?pwd=WExncDF4RXlQZzgxSmJRTFdDNC9XUT09.

A copy of the meeting agenda will also be posted.
While the Board is temporarily suspending the “in person” public participation segment
of our meetings, individuals wishing to provide input to the Board for its consideration
may email comments to David Brannock at dave.brannock@betheltate.org prior to the
April 28, 2020 meeting at 6:00.

a.title: Click to read more about: COVID-19 Update April 10, 2020

div.a: Read More about COVID-19 Update April 10, 2020
Open Enrollment Application Process for 2020-2021 School Year

p.span: Due to the Covid-19 virus, open enrollment applications for the 2020 - 2021 school year are currently being accepted by through the following process -

span.strong: Scan or take a picture of the application with your cell phone and send to us via:

li.span: Mail to 675 W. Plane Street Bethel, OH 45106

strong.span: DO NOT drop off your application in person at the Central Office.
If you have questions, email Linda Mathes at
or leave a message at 734-2271 ext. 7005 and she will get back with you.
